title: Video: The Horrors – Still Life
body:
[![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/thehorrorsstillife-660x356.jpg "thehorrorsstillife")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9033-video-the-horrors-still-life/attachment/thehorrorsstillife-2/)

The official video for the single ‘_Still Life_’, from **The Horrors’** new LP, _Skying_, dropped today. You can watch the video and stream the album below.
